name: Autana
description:
Autana

Autana is a 2D action platformer set in a post-apocalyptic Japan. The player must use a combination of attacks and movement options to keep their radiation suit charged by killing the evil robots that took over the world long ago.  Level up and defeat the robot overlord that wronged you.

Credits:
Allen Hull - Dev
Thomas Bai - Dev
Zach Miao - Dev
Jake Lohrke - Dev
Josh Lohrke - Dev

Edward Thomson - Music
Samuel Ovens - Voice Acting
Akin Coffy - Music
